entry.title: SPECIAL WEATHER STATEMENT IN EFFECT, Pickering
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 05:13 AM EDT Saturday 28 May 2016

entry.title: Current Conditions: Mist, 18.1°C

entry.title: Saturday: Chance of showers. High 31 except 22 near Lake Ontario. POP 30%
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud. 30 percent chance of showers this afternoon with risk of a thunderstorm. Wind becoming southeast 20 km/h late this morning. High 31 except 22 near Lake Ontario. UV index 8 or very high. Forecast issued 05:00 AM EDT Saturday 28 May 2016

entry.title: Saturday night: Chance of showers. Low 18. POP 30%
entry.summary: Partly cloudy. 30 percent chance of showers this evening and after midnight. Risk of a thunderstorm this evening. Wind southeast 20 km/h becoming light this evening. Low 18. Forecast issued 05:00 AM EDT Saturday 28 May 2016

entry.title: Sunday: Chance of showers. High 28 except 22 near Lake Ontario. POP 40%
